languages.text: "Это представитель расы разумных хищников, пожирателей пульсаров, чьи угодья — звездные системы. Они столь стары, что, полагаю, именно благодаря их виду во вселенной появилась концепция божеств. Сама реальность прогибается под мощью этих титанов, но когда-то древняя ксенораса смогла повергнуть их, разъединить на части и пленить в темницах, подобных этой".

"A specimen of an ancient predator race, devourers of pulsars who feasted on star systems. Reality itself bent to their power, but many millennia ago, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, shatter them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."
languages.original_text: "Это представитель расы разумных хищников, пожирателей пульсаров, чьи угодья — звездные системы. Они столь стары, что, полагаю, именно благодаря их виду во вселенной появилась концепция божеств. Сама реальность прогибается под мощью этих титанов, но когда-то древняя ксенораса смогла повергнуть их, разъединить на части и пленить в темницах, подобных этой".

traits.locale_text: "This is a specimen of the intelligent predator race, the devourers of pulsars, and the star systems are their hunting grounds. They are so ancient that I suspect they are the reason that the concept of gods even exists in the universe. The reality itself bends to their power, but in the days oy yore, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, split them into pieces and imprison them in the prisons similar to this one."

"This is a specimen of the intelligent predator race, the devourers of pulsars, and the star systems are their hunting grounds. They are so ancient that I suspect they are the reason that the concept of gods even exists in the universe. The reality itself bends to their power, but in the days oy yore, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, split them into pieces and imprison them in the prisons similar to this one."

"This is a specimen of the intelligent predator race, the devourers of pulsars, and the star systems are their hunting grounds. They are so ancient, I suspect they are the reason the concept of gods even exists in the universe. The reality itself bends to their power, but in the days oy yore, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, split them into pieces and put them away in prisons similar to this one."

"This is a specimen of the intelligent predator race, the devourers of pulsars, and the star systems are their hunting grounds. They are so ancient, I suspect they are the reason the concept of gods even exists in the universe. The reality itself bends to their power, but in the days oy yore, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, split them into pieces and put them away in prisons similar to this one."

"A specimen of an intelligent predator race, devourers of pulsars who feast on star systems. They are so ancient that I suspect they are the reason the concept of gods even exists in the universe. Reality itself bends to their power, but in days of yore, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, split them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."

"A specimen of an ancient predator race, devourers of pulsars who feasted on star systems. Reality itself bent to their power, but many millennia ago, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, shatter them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."

languages.text: « C'est un spécimen d'une race ancienne de prédateurs, des dévoreurs de pulsars qui se nourrissaient de systèmes stellaires. La réalité se plie à leur pouvoir, mais il y a des millénaires, des xénos sont parvenus à les vaincre, à les diviser en morceaux et à les enfermer dans des prisons semblables à celle-ci. »
languages.original_text: "A specimen of an ancient predator race, devourers of pulsars who feasted on star systems. Reality itself bent to their power, but many millennia ago, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, shatter them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un spécimen d'une race intelligente de prédateurs, les dévoreurs de pulsars, et les systèmes stellaires sont leurs terrains de chasse. Ils sont si anciens qu'ils sont sûrement à l'origine du concept même de dieux dans l'univers. La réalité se plie à leur pouvoir, mais jadis, une race ancienne de xénos parvint à les vaincre, à les diviser en morceaux et à les enfermer dans des prisons semblables à celle-ci. »

languages.text: «Un espécimen de una raza ancestral de depredadores, devoradores de púlsares que se alimentaban de sistemas estelares. La misma realidad se doblegaba ante su poder, pero hace muchos milenios, una antigua especie xenos logró derrotarlos, dividirlos en pedazos y encerrarlos en prisiones como la que tiene ante usted».
languages.original_text: "A specimen of an ancient predator race, devourers of pulsars who feasted on star systems. Reality itself bent to their power, but many millennia ago, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, shatter them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."

traits.locale_text: «Se trata de un espécimen de una raza de depredadores inteligentes, los devoradores de púlsares, y los sistemas estelares son su terreno de caza. Son tan antiguos que sospecho que son el origen del concepto de las deidades en el universo. La misma realidad se doblega a su voluntad, pero, hace eras, una antigua raza xenos consiguió derrotarlos, dividirlos en pedazos y encerrarlos en prisiones similares a esta».

languages.text: “它是某种古老掠食种族的样本。那个种族以脉冲星为食，无数恒星系统都是它们的狩猎场，就连现实本身都会屈从于它们的力量。然而，很久之前，某个古老的异形种族成功地打败了它们，把它们化成碎片，关在类似这样的牢狱之中。”
languages.original_text: "A specimen of an ancient predator race, devourers of pulsars who feasted on star systems. Reality itself bent to their power, but many millennia ago, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, shatter them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."

traits.locale_text: “它是某种拥有智慧的掠食种族的样本。那个种族以脉冲星为食，无数恒星系统都是它们的狩猎场。它们的存在过于古老，我甚至怀疑宇宙中‘神明’这个概念本身便是源于它们，就连现实本身都会屈从于它们的力量。然而，很久之前，某个古老的异形种族成功地打败了它们，把它们化成碎片，关在类似这样的牢狱之中。”

languages.text: "Ein Exemplar einer uralten räuberischen Spezies, die Pulsare verschlangen und sich von Sternensystemen ernährten. Die Realität selbst beugte sich ihrer Macht, doch vor vielen Jahrtausenden ist es einer uralten Xenos-Spezies gelungen, sie zu besiegen, sie zu zerteilen und sie in ähnliche Gefängnisse wie dieses zu sperren."
languages.original_text: "A specimen of an ancient predator race, devourers of pulsars who feasted on star systems. Reality itself bent to their power, but many millennia ago, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, shatter them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist ein Exemplar der intelligenten räuberischen Spezies, die Pulsare verschlingen, und die Sternensysteme sind ihr Jagdrevier. Sie sind so uralt, ich halte sie für den Grund, warum das Konzept von Göttern im Universum überhaupt existiert. Die Realität selbst beugt sich ihre Macht, doch in grauer Vorzeit ist es einmal einer uralten Xenos-Spezies gelungen, sie zu besiegen, sie zu zerteilen und sie in ähnliche Gefängnisse wie dieses zu sperren."

languages.text: 「これはパルサーを食い荒らす知性を持つプレデター種族の標本であり、星系は彼らの狩猟場だ。現実そのものが彼らの力に屈しているが、大昔、古代のゼノが彼らを打ち負かし、バラバラに分割して、このような牢獄に閉じ込めたのだ」
languages.original_text: "A specimen of an ancient predator race, devourers of pulsars who feasted on star systems. Reality itself bent to their power, but many millennia ago, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, shatter them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."

traits.locale_text: 「これはパルサーを食い荒らす知性を持つプレデター種族の標本であり、星系は彼らの狩猟場だ。彼らは、とても古く、宇宙に神々という概念が存在するのも彼らのおかげではないだろうかと私は疑っている。現実そのものが彼らの力に屈しているが、大昔、古代の異種族が彼らを打ち負かし、バラバラに分割して、ここと同じような牢獄に閉じ込めたのだ」

languages.text: "Yıldız sistemlerinden beslenen pulsar yutucuların, eski bir yırtıcı ırkın örneği. Gerçeklik onların gücü önünde diz çökerdi ama binlerce yıl önce kadim bir zeno ırkı; onları alt etmeyi başardı, parçalara ayırdı ve karşında gördüğün gibi zindanlara kilitledi."
languages.original_text: "A specimen of an ancient predator race, devourers of pulsars who feasted on star systems. Reality itself bent to their power, but many millennia ago, an ancient xenos race managed to defeat them, shatter them into pieces, and lock them away in prisons like the one you see before you."
